home_goals_percentile: Home team's goal scoring relative to all teams (0-100 scale)
away_goals_percentile: Away team's goal scoring relative to all teams (0-100 scale)
home_conceded_percentile: Home team defensive strength (higher = better, fewer goals conceded)
home_goals_skewness: Home team goal scoring skewness (positive=few games w/ many goals, negative=consistent)
home_conceded_kurtosis: Home defensive kurtosis (high=rare defeats but severe, low=predictable)
home_scoring_cv: Home team coefficient of variation in scoring (higher=more inconsistent)
home_goals_iqr: Home team goal scoring consistency (lower=more consistent)
home_anomaly_count_5: Count of anomalous home performances in last 5 games
home_ma_deviation: Absolute deviation from 5-game moving average (consistency indicator)
home_team_tier: Home team tier (1=Elite, 2=Mid-table, 3=Struggling) based on historical performance
team_tier_diff: Tier differential (negative=away team is stronger tier)
home_days_rest: Days since home team's last match
rest_advantage: Home team rest advantage (positive=home better rested)
home_winning_momentum: Home team winning streak momentum (0-1 scale, higher=on winning run)
home_goals_sqrt: Square root transformation of home goals (non-linear dampening)
home_goals_log: Log transformation of home goals (handles skewed distribution)
home_points_sq: Squared home team points (captures non-linear impact)
home_offensive_efficiency: Home team offensive efficiency ratio (balance of goals scored to conceded)
home_defensive_efficiency: Home team defensive efficiency (higher is better, fewer goals conceded)
home_strength_index: Composite home team strength index [0-1] (form, offense, defense, consistency)
matchup_threat_score: Matchup threat score (positive=home advantage, negative=away upset likely)
home_form_x_quality: Interaction: home team form points × team quality score
home_momentum_x_tier: Interaction: home team winning momentum × inverse team tier
